page.title: 03Braithwell-Amenities
page.content: Braithwell has a Post Office, which is also a General Store.A Postman delivers mail to houses every weekday.A Village Store sells general goods,newspapers, magazines meat and vegetables. Newspapers are delivered to homes daily.There is a Printing shop, a Hairdresser, a Plant nursery, two Public Houses and a Working Men's Club. Since the roof of the Methodist Church collapsed, it has not been used(The Playgroup for toddlers was held there).There is a garage for car repairs, but not petrol.A mobile Library visits every Tuesday.A mobile Greengrocer's shop visits twice weekly .There is a bus service every half hour until 6.00pm.,then it is every hour.There is a Doctors' Surgery.A Pharmacist delivers medicines to the Post Office.
